c74object.name: sw.shared-state
c74object.digest: Monitor and control soundworks' shared states.
c74object.description: Utility to monitor and control IRCAM-ISMM soundworks' shared states within Max using OSC communications Communicate with dictionaries or key:value pair to this object.

objarg.name: ip
objarg.digest: IP Address of soundworks' server. Default is localhost

objarg.name: portsend
objarg.digest: Local port of soundworks' server. Default is 57121.

objarg.name: portrecv
objarg.digest: Remote port of soundworks' server. Default is 57122.

objarg.name: speedLim
objarg.digest: Speedlimit for sending OSC datas. Default is 20 ms.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Ask for the state's current values
method.description: Bang to ask for the state's current values. Output from the first outlet will be a dictionary.

method.name: schema
method.digest: Ask for the schema of soundworks' states
method.description: Ask for the formal definition of the parameters of soundworks' state.
